trans-unit.source: Computes the width and height of a character string which may contain one or more tab characters

trans-unit.source: one tab-stop position. In this case, the tab stops are separated by the distance specified by this value.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0 (Default), tabs are expanded to eight times the average character width.

trans-unit.source: This function uses the currently selected font to compute the dimensions of the string.
